item.title: Wide and deep pothole, 18th March

item.title: Wide and deep pothole, 18th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 11 Cudnall Street, Charlton Kings

item.title: Fly tip of Plastic Waste and Garden Waste at the Location, 18th March
item.description:
The location is on the Aggs Hill Road / Cotswold Way Road in the Lay by / Field Entrance on the right hand side going towards the Burnt Oak Crossroads. The fly tip is a mix of Plastic and Garden waste and has been there for a while. Please can it be cleared away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Charlton Kings
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Forgotten roadworks sign, 18th March
item.description:
ROAD AHEAD CLOSED sign left over from recent closure of Shelburne Road (which reopened a fortnight ago). Sign has been left behind on A40 Lansdown Road, between traffic lights at Gloucester Road junction and railway bridge. Needs removing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 90 Lansdown Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pothole increasing in depth, 17th March
item.description:
This pothole is on the end of a previously repaired pothole. It is getting deeper and is now causing problems to traffic especially as it is on a very busy bus route and there has been a lot of activity by heavy lorries.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 121 Caernarvon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: V large pothole, 17th March
item.description:
